title: Pilot
description: A magician is asked by the mother of a plane-crash victim to check into a possible conspiracy; he discovers that the plane crash was staged.

title: The Manhunters
description: Someone is trying to kill Max Pomeroy, Tony Blake's friend. The investigation leads Blake to an alcoholic lady gambler in distress and the plot thickens in a casino.

title: The Vanishing Lady
description: When Julie Carter, the singer in Tony Blake's magic opening act and personal friend, is kidnapped in her dressing room, the magician has to race against time to save her.

title: Illusion in Terror
description: A car accident sees Tony Blake's girlfriend Joanna taken by ambulance & soon pronounced dead but the body has vanished. Suspecting foul play, Blake investigates Joanna's past and what he finds endangers his own life.

title: Lightning on a Dry Day
description: A hospital patient is spooked senseless by the fire in one of Tony Blake's charity magic acts. Blake's investigation into the young man's past leads him to a small town riddled with quirky residents.

title: Ovation for Murder
description: During a backyard party where Tony Blake performs, the magician witnesses a Greek man he rescued earlier shoot another man. Blake suspects he was impaired and arranges an elaborate illusion in a hospital to catch the real killer.

title: Man on Fire
description: While arguing with her boyfriend, a woman falls down stairs and dies. The man is coerced into stuffing her body in a trunk and tossing it in a lake. Tony Blake gets involved when bad guys come after his new magic student, the man's son.

title: Lady in a Trap
description: Out scuba diving, Tony Blake rescues a ditzy librarian he met earlier whose boyfriend tossed her off his yacht with intention to kill. An old copy of The Machiavelli becomes the pivotal point of Blake's investigation.

title: The Man Who Lost Himself
description: A man fleeing pursuers crashes into Tony Blake's stage, sending both of them to the hospital. The man wakes up amnesiac and Blake enlists his friends to help the man recover his memory.

title: Nightmare in Steel
description: The husband of Tony Blake's clumsy new assistant has been kidnapped and is being forced to commit a crime aboard a large ship. Tony infiltrates the boat with his friends to rescue the man and avert the crime before it's too late.

title: Shattered Image
description: Tony Blake must protect a little girl who is targeted by her father's former mob associates. In the process, Tony attempts to clear the man's name who himself is on the run, framed for murder.

title: The Illusion of the Curious Counterfeit: Part 1
description: Performing at the Magic Castle, Tony Blake notices his ex-girlfriend in the audience, looking distraught. A man behind her is acting strange. Tony invites her onstage and makes her vanish but the bad guy is fast on their trail.

title: The Illusion of the Curious Counterfeit: Part 2
description: When his attempt to free his ex-girlfriend from a cell fails, Tony Blake has a confrontation with her ex-mobster father whom he still blames for his failed relationship.

title: The Illusion of the Stainless Steel Lady
description: The Magician investigates his old, recluse movie-star friend, Irene Denore, after an attractive blonde claiming to be her estranged grand-daughter tells him she suspects foul play.

title: The Illusion of the Queen's Gambit
description: The magician is performing on-board of the Queen Mary when masked robbers interrupt his act. His friend, Ed Cassidy, is blamed for the robbery and Tony Blake sets out to prove his innocence.

title: The Illusion of Black Gold
description: Tony Blake stages an elaborate illusion to fake the death of a scientist who can extract oil from shale rock but he is kidnapped and auctioned off to the highest bidder.

title: The Illusion of the Lost Dragon
description: In order to find a jade dragon which has been stolen from his very old friend in Chinatown, Tony Blake will have to face a horrible death in a lava pit when the floor is literally taken from under him.

title: The Illusion of the Deadly Conglomerate
description: Tony Blake reconnects with a homeless old magician friend; the shelter where he's landed specializes in murdering the downtrodden for profit and it's up to the magician to rescue him before it's too late.

title: The Illusion of the Fatal Arrow
description: In order to prevent further murders by a serial killer who uses a bow and arrow, Tony Blake partners with a psychic who accurately predicted the first victim's death.

title: The Illusion of the Lethal Playthings
description: Someone is trying to kill a friend of Tony Blake's by detonating bombs and using marionettes and remote controlled toys. Tony's investigation brings him to a toy shop and he becomes the target of the mad man.

title: The Illusion of the Cat's Eye
description: A museum enlists Tony Blake's help to investigate the "smoke & mirrors" theft of a highly guarded Egyptian cat statue.

title: The Illusion of the Evil Spikes
description: A magician is killed during the filming of a highly risky magic trick. Blake takes on both the investigation and his friend's place in recreating the Table of Death illusion for the cameras.
